name: BLOB (itch) (edenreem)
description:
you are a blob. this is a puzzle platformer.

 run, hide and eat.  in life it's survive or die.

this game was made in classic, hand-drawn, 2d animation and coded in unity by me (Eden Reem) as a part as part of my visual communications bachelor's degree At Bezalel academy for arts and design.

special tanks to Danny Bacon, Danielle Elias and Nir Lahad for both technical and mental support.
